August 6, 2020 POSReady 7 and WEC7 Discontinuation Notice POSReady 7 and WEC 7 Operating Systems go end of support on Oct. 12, 2021. After this date, Microsoft will no longer release security updates, which impacts PCI compliance.Teams need to work with customers to obtain OS upgrades or a hardware refresh if required. Windows 10 is not supported by Microsoft and Intel on all legacy hardware platforms. More information on the end of support dates and options can be found here <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=b5e794fc-1e55-4806-8b97-6f60b240f104#/doccenter/8ef384b5-b3bb-424b-823f-729a41e48366/doc/%252Fdd196e06dc-3738-d46d-9523-f4780ed862c3%252Flf008b5fae-8325-4237-97e3-e121f2146397/grid/]]>.
Contactless Dine-In
Contactless Dine-In allows consumers to place their order and pay for it seamlessly, which reduces contact with the server and increases safety for both parties. Check out our Feature Focus Guide: Contactless Dine-In <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/r3/ek/va/Feature Focus Guide-Contactless Dine-In.pdf]]> for all the details about configuring Contactless Dine-In.
